description.narrative: The project is expected to have strong development impact as it will lead to: (i) increased access to finance for individuals and micro entrepreneurs operating in agrisector in an IDA and FCS country which will lead to farm productivity enhancements, better livelihoods and food security; (ii) higher competitiveness in the sector that will directly increase the range of products and services, with special focus on agriculture; and, (iii) creation of new jobs for individuals and micro entrepreneurs, including women, in rural areas. Beyond economic considerations, Kosovo's reliance on agriculture also has a crucial social dimension. Approximately 60% of the country's poor live in rural areas and depend on the agricultural sector for living. In this context, the project will reach the base of the pyramid by directly supporting the most vulnerable segments of the population.
